item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>I demand a race-off between our Mini and Mum's MG!!</p>
item.content:encoded: I demand a race-off between our Mini and Mum’s MG!!

item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>down hall lane it is then... gentleman (and lady) start your engines!</p>
item.content:encoded: down hall lane it is then… gentleman (and lady) start your engines!

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Thanks for the mention - my car is silver not red and I'd beat Simon at any time!! I was taken out by friends for a birthday lunch today and they bought me an Isadora Duncan scarf (among other things) and we travelled, roof down, in glorious sunshine - who says getting old is bad? 52 seems quite fun!! I am not overloaded for the wedding - just well organised!! I look forward to having you all at home for a family meal on the Thursday..</p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the mention – my car is silver not red and I’d beat Simon at any time!! I was taken out by friends for a birthday lunch today and they bought me an Isadora Duncan scarf (among other things) and we travelled, roof down, in glorious sunshine – who says getting old is bad? 52 seems quite fun!! I am not overloaded for the wedding – just well organised!! I look forward to having you all at home for a family meal on the Thursday..
